name: Odd Job Eddie
overview: Well, here we go again, telly's on the blink, we can't play our favourite games or watch Eastenders. Better send for the King of Do-It-Yourself, ODD JOB EDDIE, jack of all trades, master of none. Try and take Eddie through the works of the TV collecting his tools as you go. Avoid all moving creatures which are instant destruction but you may use the sliding platforms to walk across. If you collect all his tools, take them to the viewing room to find his way out again. This multi-stage machine code arcade game provides great fun and entertainment for even the most seasoned campaigner.
